virtuals.subtitle: I missed a flight once due to an episode in the airport and even though it was entirely my fault, Delta paid for a hotel and got me on the…

89d5367df2ec.title: This is why I fly Delta.

content.subtitle: I missed a flight once due to an episode in the airport and even though it was entirely my fault, Delta paid for a hotel and got me on the…

paragraphs.name: 710e
paragraphs.text: This is why I fly Delta. They have always taken really good care of me. In fact, one flight attendant told me that they try to put people with mobility devices in business or first class, even if it means upgrading them for free. Apparently it’s easier to deal with in those sections so it’s not selfless.

content.subtitle: Conscientious use needs to be normalized. I don’t know how to deal with hot dogs, but this would be a start.

paragraphs.name: 24c9
paragraphs.text: We really just need to amend the ADA to issue IDs or permits — require states to ‘shall issue’ without fee and without waits longer than a week — so that these arguments would be solved quickly without having to reveal anything other than a tag and a symbol. Same for guide animals.

paragraphs.text: I rather think that, following the disgraceful Dao episode a few days ago and now upon reading this absolute disgrace United Airlines are straight at the top of my shit list (after President Real Donny Fart — even United aren’t that stupid but it’s a close call). I am so lucky that I have zero chance of being contaminated by contact with a single one of United’s absurdly stupid illiterate employees.

paragraphs.text: We have no control of the outcome, only the choices we make. Remember that. Otherwise… tough!

paragraphs.name: afba
paragraphs.text: I have psoriatic arthritis. I’ve been fortunate that the only times I’ve been as limited in mobility as you are have been relatively brief but I get it. And I’m in a couple of autoimmune arthritis groups — one for PsA which does involve spondylitis for some of us, one more general including some with AS and some with spinal involvement from RA. These…

paragraphs.text: Good god, what jerks. If you want someone to call and pretend to be you and really hound United let me know! (This is Clayton) I will gladly demand stuff from these jerks!

paragraphs.text: Where did you share it? I shared it on the Spondylitis Association forum.

In the old system I have uSpA (“undifferentiated seronegative spondyloarthopathy”), so I get some psoriasis and pink-eye and reactive and enteric symptoms as well as the primary axial symptoms, so I just hit the HLA-B27 goldmine! (To look on the bright…

paragraphs.text: Seems pretty clear what happened. United staff didn’t like their judgment being questioned and dug their heels in to “save face” about being wrong. Their ego was more important than your comfort. Toxic authoritarian culture.
